change.changenote: Section 1 definition of "vehicle" BEFORE amended by 2014-5-43, effective November 17, 2014 (BC Reg 200/2014).

bcl:definition.bcl:text: vehicle includes a boat, ship, vessel, aircraft, train, railway car or equipment, motor vehicle, all terrain vehicle, trailer or other movable structure.

change.changenote: Section 2 BEFORE amended by 2023-10-281, effective March 30, 2023 (Royal Assent).

bcl:section.bcl:text: An operator is responsible for ensuring that the food in his or her food establishment is safe for human consumption.
